block.p: The Borough of Manhattan Community College men's team advanced to the semifinals of the Division III National Junior College Athletic Association tournament with a 4-1 victory over Manchester (Conn.) Community College on Pier 40 in Manhattan yesterday. B.M.C.C. (14-2-1) fell behind by 1-0 early, but took a 2-1 lead at halftime on goals by Jerry Bekoe. Bekoe, a striker from Ghana, has 23 goals this season. The Panthers will play Richland (Tex.) Community College on Saturday at Herkimer (N.Y.) Community College.
